translation.en: who witnessed the coming of man...
and darkness come to our lands.
I saw the tiger, Shere Khan,
and breaking the jungle's ancient law.
translation.ko: 정글의 오랜 법칙을 깨는 것을 보았다

translation.en: I saw the jungle place its hopes into the hands
I've never seen a man-cub before.
What are we going to do with it?
-It's a lovely night, isn't it? -What is it that you want, Tabaqui?
translation.ko: 밤공기가 좋지? 원하는 게 뭐야, 타바키?

translation.en: What's that I smell? Fresh kill?
If it's bones you're after, look elsewhere.
We have enough mouths to feed.
He sounds in ill temper tonight.
That he does. That he does.
I found the man-cub! I found the man-cub!
A council must be held if we are to keep him.
-Keep him? -Don't let him out of your sight.
Nisha, you have called council. What's the matter at hand?
-That's not a wolf. -That doesn't belong here.
translation.ko: 늑대가 아니잖아 늑대 무리에 들일 순 없어

translation.en: Well, this is most unusual indeed.
translation.ko: 음... 이런 진귀한 일도 다 있군

translation.en: Nisha, you wish to raise this cub as if he were your own?
translation.ko: 니샤 네 새끼처럼 키우고 싶은 거야?

translation.en: This cub was not born among us.
So, who here speaks for the cub?
The law states that the life of a cub
may be bought, for a price.
Who else will speak for the cub?
-Bagheera... -He's not a wolf. He has no say.
translation.ko: - 바기라... - 늑대가 아니잖아 발언할 자격도 없어

translation.en: He was the teacher of your cubs. That makes him a member of the pack.
translation.ko: 새끼 늑대들의 선생인데 자격이 왜 없어

translation.en: Bagheera, have you lost your mind? A man-cub living in a jungle?
translation.ko: 바기라, 정신 나갔어? 새끼 인간이 정글에 살다니!

translation.en: There is no one to come looking for him.
translation.ko: 녀석을 찾으러 올 사람은 아무도 없어

translation.en: This is not your concern, Shere Khan.
translation.ko: 네가 낄 일 아니다, 시어 칸

translation.en: I have already tasted its mother's blood.
Your right according to whose law?
You do not want to challenge me.
is under the protection of the pack.
Should you decide to take me,
As long as I am leader,
this part of the jungle is closed to you.
The day you miss your kill,
You will treat him as you would your own.
As long as I am alive,
the pack will stand by the man-cub.
But we never do it for sport.
translation.ko: 하지만 결코 장난삼아 해선 안 돼

translation.en: We look them in the eye
How old is the jungle, Bagheera?
The jungle has been here since before you were born
translation.ko: 정글은 네가 태어나기 전부터 여기 있었고

translation.en: why am I different to the other wolves?
That's why you need special training.
You know what your trouble is?
how many ants can you fit in your mouth?
and your mouth is really big.
-Why do I have to do this? -'Cause I said so.
translation.ko: 이건 왜 하는 건데요? 내가 시켰으니까

translation.en: Tell me the three laws, now.
"No wolf shall have contact with man."
Above all, the cow, which is sacred!"
Did it fall off? Is that why you don't have one?
What? Why haven't you got a tail?
I don't know. I never really thought about it.
translation.ko: 나도 몰라요 별로 생각 안 해봤는데

translation.en: "No wolf shall kill man in the jungle, for killing man only brings danger."
translation.ko: '늑대는 정글에서 인간을 죽여선 안 된다' '인간을 죽이면 위험만 따라온다'

translation.en: Oh, well. Least you know your laws.
Now, we just got to get you to run as fast as the other wolves.
All right, that's enough for today, Mowgli.
Straight back to the caves. No wandering. Run like a wolf, d'you hear?
translation.ko: 싸돌아다니지 말고 곧장 동굴로 가 늑대처럼 뛰는 거다?

translation.en: Mum taught me how to hide. She shows me loads of tricks.
translation.ko: 엄마가 숨는 법을 알려줬어 엄마한테 배운 요령이 많아

translation.en: That's why they have a go at me sometimes.
Come on. I'll race you home.
What did Baloo make you do today?
Put a scorpion on me and told me not to move.
translation.ko: 내 몸에 전갈을 올려놓고 꼼짝 말라고

translation.en: Baloo says that to all of us.
Your brother tells me you're getting faster.
He can nearly keep pace with me.
Yeah, he should just race with his freak friend!
It's only natural they spend so much time with each other.
You shouldn't let them pick on you like that.
I meant what I said to Mum. You are getting faster.
translation.ko: 엄마한테 한 말은 진심이야 너 빨라졌어

translation.en: Your father was never much of a runner either.
It's true. I was the slowest in my group.
I never thought I was gonna compete in the Running. I was sure I would fail.
-You're going to be late. -Have a good hunt, Father.
Before you know it, you'll be coming along with me. All of you!
translation.ko: 너희도 조만간 같이 가야지 다 같이!

translation.en: In the jungle, we all hunt.
you don't want to get caught.
That's why you can't join the pack
until you have passed the Running-- Pay attention!
The Running is the hunt where you...
You all know Bagheera, don't you?
In the Running, Bagheera will hunt you,
translation.ko: 도망 테스트에선 바기라가 너희를 사냥할 거다

translation.en: But I've never had one of my cubs fail.
translation.ko: 하지만 내 제자 중엔 한 명도 없었지

translation.en: And I'm not gonna start now.
and they can't even speak proper.
-I think they're funny. -There's nothing funny about them.
translation.ko: 재밌기만 하던데요 걔들 재미 하나도 없어

translation.en: You keep away, do you understand?
-I'm not afraid of them. -Only fools feel no fear, Mowgli.
translation.ko: 겁나는 것도 아닌데요 겁을 모르는 건 바보들뿐이야, 모글리

translation.en: Oh, they can't even lay eyes on her.
Oh, you don't want to meet Kaa.
is as old as the jungle.
The cow had been killed and left there to be found.
translation.ko: 소가 죽임을 당해 거기 버려져 있더군

translation.en: -It's the tiger! He's come back! -Only Khan would kill man's cattle.
translation.ko: 호랑이가 돌아온 거야! 시어 칸 아니면 누가 인간의 소를 죽여

translation.en: -One man-cub will bring more men! -It's Shere Khan!
translation.ko: 새끼 인간을 데려오니 이 꼴이 나지! 시어 칸 짓이야!

translation.en: Akela, we knew this would happen! We told you!
Can't you see, Akela, the man-cub is putting us all in danger!
translation.ko: 새끼 인간 때문에 우리 모두 위험해졌다고

translation.en: -You were wrong to ever take him in! -We should give him to the tiger!
translation.ko: 애초에 받아준 게 잘못이야 그 녀석을 호랑이한테 넘겨!

translation.en: I will see to this matter.
Shere Khan wants to bring war to the jungle.
translation.ko: 시어 칸이 정글에 전쟁을 일으키려고 해

translation.en: With man? Is he out of his mind?
This is his way of bringing chaos to the pack.
translation.ko: 이렇게 늑대 무리에 혼란을 가져오려는 거야

translation.en: -Khan wants the boy. -We can protect him.
translation.ko: 칸은 그 애를 원해요 우리가 지킬 수 있어

translation.en: You know there is only one way to protect him.
He must go to the man village.
this was always more than just a good deed.
Man is taking more of it as each season passes.
translation.ko: 계절이 지날수록 인간이 더 많이 침범하지

translation.en: may just be our only hope of survival.
translation.ko: 우리를 살아남게 해줄 유일한 희망일지도 몰라

translation.en: The jungle is no longer safe for him.
-The pack won't accept him. -They will if he passes the Running.
translation.ko: 무리에서 내쳐질 겁니다 도망 테스트만 통과하면 돼

translation.en: Of course he's not ready. He's not a wolf!
Can you run as fast as a wolf?
You've got hands with fingers on the ends, so let's use them.
translation.ko: 넌 손이 있고 끝에 손가락이 달렸다 그걸 활용해

translation.en: Do you know why those men have come?
translation.ko: 저 사람들 왜 온 줄 알아?

translation.en: They've come to hunt the tiger that steals their cattle.
translation.ko: 자기네 소를 훔치는 호랑이를 잡으러 온 거야

translation.en: -Will they kill him? -It won't be easy.
the jungle is no longer safe for you.
But if you were to be in a place where Shere Khan would never go,
translation.ko: 네가 시어 칸이 절대 안 갈 곳으로 간다면

translation.en: Where does Shere Khan never go?
translation.ko: 시어 칸이 안 갈 곳이 어딘데?

translation.en: I have seen the way you look at the village.
He wants your blood, little brother.
It was Shere Khan who killed your man-parents
translation.ko: 여러 계절 전에 네 인간 부모를 죽인 게

translation.en: and now he wants to kill you.
be able to join the pack.
you will go to the village.
Don't worry. I'll kill your tiger.
translation.ko: 걱정 말아요 그 호랑이 꼭 죽일게요

translation.en: How many's he taken this time?
Did you smell the blood, man-cub?
-The creature that did that to your tail. -It's called "fire."
translation.ko: 네 꼬리에 붙어 있던 거 '불'이라고 하는 거야

translation.en: And it's quicker than the panther.
Your kind use dark magic, man-cub.
translation.ko: 너희 종족은 흑마법을 쓴다 새끼 인간

translation.en: But I always wake up a hyena.
You should try and get some sleep.
You'll want to be rested for tomorrow.
For the others to see me as an...
This is my chance to prove myself.
To prove that I'm one of them.
Don't ever let anyone make you think otherwise.
You will always be my son, Mowgli.
You are about to take part
in one of our oldest traditions.
Those of you who pass the test...
Bagheera will perform his task as chaser.
I must warn you, Bagheera has been told not to hold back.
translation.ko: 경고한다 바기라는 주저하고 그런 거 없다

translation.en: I told you, never let your guard down.
translation.ko: 내가 말했지 절대 틈을 보이지 말라고

translation.en: I saw that look in your eye
when you were standing over him.
I did what I did because I had to.
Do you think I am stupid?
Why did you have to do that?
Why can't you see how much danger he's in?
The pack would have protected him!
Khan will kill him and tear the pack apart.
translation.ko: 칸이 그 애를 죽이고 무리를 갈기갈기 찢을 텐데?

translation.en: You are not the only one
All you care about is that he passed.
translation.ko: 넌 걔를 통과시키는 데만 관심 있지

translation.en: That is because it's my job!
Mowgli's been taken by the monkey-people!
And how much chaos you brought upon the pack.
We'll get to join them soon enough.
translation.ko: 우리도 곧 낄 수 있을 거야

translation.en: Mum says some wolves just need more time. It doesn't mean we're not good enough.
translation.ko: 엄마가 그러는데 좀 오래 걸린다고 능력이 없는 건 아니래

translation.en: Hey, why don't we have our own night hunt?
Just you and me. What do you say?
You've been spending a lot of time on your own since the monkey-people.
translation.ko: 원숭이 사람한테 잡혀갔다 온 후로 혼자만 있잖아

translation.en: It's not good to be alone.
Wolves are supposed to be with other wolves.
You're the best wolf I know!
Why do you always want to be around me, Bhoot?
I don't have any friends neither.
And we're kind of same, you and me.
Because you're special and I'm special.
We'll never be one of them! We're freaks!
It's just something your mother tells you to make you feel better about yourself
translation.ko: 너네 엄마가 너 힘내라고 해준 말일 뿐이야

translation.en: Are you afraid of me, man-cub?
Is it true that you know the past and the future?
translation.ko: 그거 진짜예요? 과거와 미래를 본다는 거?

translation.en: What is it you want from me,
Why did you save me from the monkey-people?
Why do you think the elephant saved you from the tiger pit?
translation.ko: 코끼리는 호랑이 구덩이에서 왜 널 구해줬을까?

translation.en: The whole jungle has been watching you, man-cub.
translation.ko: 온 정글이 널 지켜보고 있었다 새끼 인간

translation.en: Even you must know you are unusual.
translation.ko: 네가 별나다는 건 너도 알 거다

translation.en: I think we can both agree, Mowgli,
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 동의할 텐데 모글리

translation.en: that you are something the jungle has never seen before.
translation.ko: 넌 정글에서 한 번도 본 적이 없는 존재야

translation.en: What will you say then, man-cub?
translation.ko: 그때 뭐라고 말할 텐가? 새끼 인간?

translation.en: You have no right to be here, Shere Khan!
translation.ko: 넌 여기 있을 권리 없어 시어 칸!

translation.en: Well, I think you'll find I stay where I please.
translation.ko: 모르나 본데 난 원하는 곳에 있을 거야

translation.en: You kill man's cattle. You poison the jungle.
translation.ko: 넌 인간의 소를 죽이고 정글을 오염시킨다

translation.en: You're the reason man is here!
But you permitted man to live among you.
You pretend he is a wolf.
When we both know that is the one thing he will never be.
translation.ko: 절대 될 수 없다는 걸 잘 알면서

translation.en: He will always be a man.
But you're no longer leader now,
Akela's missed his kill! Akela's missed his kill!
As is our tradition, whoever defeats me...
translation.ko: 우리 전통에 따라 누구든 날 꺾으면

translation.en: will become leader of the pack.
If I ever see you here again, I will set your hide ablaze
translation.ko: 여기서 또 얼씬대는 날엔 네 가죽을 불사르고

translation.en: turned the weapons of man... upon us.
You have brought the pack great shame.
I have not come to rescue you.
I've come to tell you to stay.
You must stay in the village. You must not come back to the jungle.
translation.ko: 넌 마을에 남아야 해 정글로 돌아오면 안 돼

translation.en: -But the jungle is my home. -No, it isn't. Not anymore.
translation.ko: - 정글은 내 집인걸 - 아니, 이젠 아니야

translation.en: You will learn to understand their ways.
How do you know? You've never spent a day outside the jungle.
translation.ko: 어떻게 알아? 정글 밖에서 하루도 안 살아봤으면서

translation.en: I bear the marks of the collar.
I lived in a king's palace in a cage just like this.
I only heard stories about the jungle.
And I thought I could teach you. I thought I could...
translation.ko: 가르치면 될 줄 알았지 내가 가르쳐서...

translation.en: and I spent my entire life fighting.
Looks like we've both got the same enemy.
translation.ko: 우리 둘의 적이 같은 놈인 것 같군

translation.en: Here, you can keep this one.
Those of us who still stand by Akela, anyway.
They come in groups, in the night.
We've been pushed to the very edge of the jungle.
And Khan won't stop killing man's cattle.
translation.ko: 칸은 인간의 소를 계속 죽일 거고

translation.en: We're afraid of what man might do to us.
translation.ko: 인간들이 우리를 가만 안 둘 거야

translation.en: They didn't need me when I was cast out.
when will you kill the tiger? He has killed many cattle.
translation.ko: 소가 여럿 죽었는데 호랑이는 언제 잡을 거죠?

translation.en: Knows how to cover his tracks.
I did get one of his tusks, though.
I have never missed a kill since.
translation.ko: 그 후로 사냥감 놓친 적 없어요

translation.en: I have no doubt, I will get him.
translation.ko: 의심할 거 없어요 꼭 잡을 거니까

translation.en: a word I'm saying, do you?
I will show you the hunter who took this...
if you help me rid the jungle of the tiger.
Shere Khan has brought us nothing but chaos.
Akela, we must kill the tiger.
than break with the laws of the jungle.
But I'm not bound by those laws anymore, Akela,
translation.ko: 전 이제 그 법에 얽매이지 않아요, 아켈라

translation.en: and this is not the jungle you once knew.
I looked you in the eye and saw no fear.
I believed then that one day you would bring peace to the jungle.
translation.ko: 그땐 믿었지 언젠가 네가 정글에 평화를 가져올 거라고

translation.en: But you have become a man now, Mowgli.
But neither am I a wolf.
-Which of you will follow me? -We can't, Mowgli.
translation.ko: 누가 날 따라올래요? 우린 못 가, 모글리

translation.en: using a man's tool to do your killing.
translation.ko: 인간의 도구를 써서 날 죽이려 하다니

translation.en: What would Baloo and Bagheera think?
You know, I can still hear
the night I took her life.
Forgive me for doubting you, Mowgli.
With the tiger and the hunter now gone,
had given the jungle a voice.
And for as long as he stood watch,
it would speak a lasting peace.
